Projects

A flexible platform that enables policy-makers and users of all backgrounds to leverage large-scale spatial analysis.
Created with Vue, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS (EB, S3, CloudFront, RDS, R53)

Github

SkyImage

Image processing software built in Python that consolidates ground-based and satellite-based imagery to support high-fidelity mutli-source and multi-spectral feature detection.

Github

GeoQuery

Search, Know, Change. GeoQuery is an easy online big-data search tool for cross-service spatiotemporal searches and analysis.

Github

Flickr GeoSearch

Flickr GeoSearch is an all-inclusive python application that leverages the Flickr API to execute geospatial photo searches across the entire Flickr photo community. Created with Python 3.0, Flickr GeoSearch is lightweight, portable, and cross-compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux. Simple to use and distribute, Flickr GeoSearch opens the door for anyone to use and analyze social media big data.

Github

ClassyFi

ClassyFi is an in-browser photo classification program featuring real-time integration with Google Sheets for dynamic multi-user categorization and data-management. With an easy-to-use interface and open source customizability, ClassyFi is the optimal tool for manually classifying large photo datasets.

Github
